      • makeRequest

        protected final boolean makeRequest()
        Updates the database using the command. Stack traces of errors will be printed during testing. 1 - Increments the index. 2 - Grabs the command. 3 - Grabs a connection. 4 - Executes the command.
        Specified by:
        makeRequest in class DatabaseInteractor<java.lang.Boolean>
        Returns:
        false for failure. true for success.
